Name: Dash Shooters
About the game: Dash Shooters is a multiplayer, fast paced racing game, where the main movement mechanic is dashing! Race your friends to the finish line through a randomly generated map, dodging obstacles, gathering powerups, shooting crystals/other players, and dashing through objectives along the way! There are also in game settings to change the style of play, so there can be countless hours of fun! :) Features: -Fast paced movement -Multiplayer for up to 6 players -Four unique powerups -Combat (can be turned on and off) -Randomly generated maps, with different difficulties -Objectives to dash through -Crystals to shoot (great for practicing aim) -High skill ceiling -In game settings to change the style of play -And much more :)
